Sentencas: The development of novel and high-performance cathodes is a critical issue to be addressed in order to reduce Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) operation temperature to the 600-800 degrees;C range or less.
Titulo: Synthesis, structure and electrochemical performance of cobaltite-based composite cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: The performance of CeO2-based composite cathodes is very attractive to such operational temperatures.
Titulo: Synthesis, structure and electrochemical performance of cobaltite-based composite cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: In this work, La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 (LSCF) and Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 (SDC) powders were synthesized by different synthesis methods and mechanically mixed to prepare LSCF-SDC composite cathodes.
Titulo: Synthesis, structure and electrochemical performance of cobaltite-based composite cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Screen-printed LSCF-SDC/CGO/LSCF-SDC symmetrical cells were sintered at 1150 degrees;C for 4 h and characterized by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy in static air.
Titulo: Synthesis, structure and electrochemical performance of cobaltite-based composite cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction and scanning electron microscopy were employed to characterize the powders.
Titulo: Synthesis, structure and electrochemical performance of cobaltite-based composite cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Area specific resistance values of 0.72 and 2.77 O cm2 at 800 degrees;C were found for composite cathodes containing SDC powder synthesized by modified Pechini and microwave-assisted combustion methods, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis, structure and electrochemical performance of cobaltite-based composite cathodes for IT-SOFC

Sentencas: Furthermore, the activation energy of the composite cathode containing SDC derived from modified Pechini method is 1.18 eV, i.e., much lower than 1.73 eV, value determined for LSCF with SDC from microwave-combustion method.
Titulo: Synthesis, structure and electrochemical performance of cobaltite-based composite cathodes for IT-SOFC
